title: Can Assassin's Creed Save Ubisoft? - IGN Daily Fix
description:
On today's Daily Fix:
Following a "challenging" year of losses and few releases, Ubisoft is preparing to pump resources into the Assassin's Creed franchise to secure its future. BlueTwelve Studio’s cat-based adventure game Stray has received an ESRB rating for Xbox consoles, suggesting its time as a PlayStation console exclusive could be coming to an end. Finally, Brendan O'Brien, the actor credited with coming up with the original voice of Crash Bandicoot, has died. He was 60.

#IGN #Gaming #AssassinsCreed

title: The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom - MAJOR Cheat: Duplicate Items, Infinite Money
description:
Several duplication exploits have been discovered in The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom. There's a dupe trick for undiscovered items, attachable materials like diamonds and monster parts, and weapons straight out of your inventory. These are big cheats that can break the game's economy by granting you virtually unlimited money and powerful weapons, so use at your own discretion.

#IGN #Gaming #TearsOfTheKingdom

title: The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom - All Climbing Gear Locations
description:
Where can you find the Tears of the Kingdom Climbing Gear location? The Zelda TotK climbing set is one of the most useful armor sets for exploration as it greatly increases the speed at which you climb. But the location of this gear isn’t obvious, so we’re here to help with this quick How-To guide. This guide includes locations and tips for all three pieces: the Climbing Gear, the Climbing Bandana, and the Climbing Boots.

The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom is the sequel to Breath of the Wild, but introduces new armor sets, enemies, locations, mechanics, and many more additions from the first game. Make sure to check out our wiki on IGN for all the info you could ever need for your return to Hyrule.

#IGN #Gaming #Zelda

title: The Little Mermaid - Official 'Unfortunate' Teaser Trailer (2023) Halle Bailey, Melissa McCarthy
description:
Get another look at The Little Mermaid in this latest teaser for Disney's upcoming live-action remake of the classic fairy tale. The Little Mermaid stars Halle Bailey as Ariel, Melissa McCarthy as Ursula, Jonah Hauer-King as Prince Eric, Javier Bardem as King Triton, Daveed Diggs as Sebastian, Jacob Tremblay as Flounder, Awkwafina as Scuttle, Noma Dumezweni, Jude Akuwudike, and more.

The Little Mermaid, directed by Rob Marshall and written by David Magee, opens in theaters on May 26, 2023.

#IGN #TheLittleMermaid #Movies

title: White Men Can't Jump - Official 'Don't Worry Mommy' Clip (2023) Sinqua Walls, Jack Harlow
description:
Watch this clip from White Men Can't Jump, an upcoming comedy movie starring Sinqua Walls, Jack Harlow, Teyana Taylor, Laura Harrier, Vince Staples, Myles Bullock, and Lance Reddick.

White Men Can’t Jump is a modern retelling of the iconic 1992 film that celebrates the streetball hustling culture of Los Angeles. Sinqua Walls stars as Kamal, once a promising player who derailed his future in the sport, and multi-platinum rap superstar Jack Harlow makes his movie debut as Jeremy, a former star of the game whose injuries stalled his own career. Juggling tenuous relationships, financial pressures, and serious internal struggles, the two ballers—opposites who are seemingly miles apart—find they might have more in common than they imagined possible.

The film is written by Kenya Barris and Doug Hall. White Men Can’t Jump is produced by Kenya Barris and Paul Hall, and it is executive produced by Blake Griffin, Ryan Kalil, Noah Weinstein, Calmatic, Doug Hall, E. Brian Dobbins, and James Powers.

White Men Can't Jump, directed by Calmatic, begins streaming on May 19, 2023, exclusively on Hulu in the U.S., Star+ in Latin America, and Disney+ under the Star banner in all other territories.

#IGN #Movies

title: White Men Can't Jump - Official 'He Got a Flamethrower' Clip (2023) Sinqua Walls, Jack Harlow
description:
One way to break up a fight is to bring a flamethrower. Check out this clip from an upcoming comedy movie starring Sinqua Walls, Jack Harlow, Teyana Taylor, Laura Harrier, Vince Staples, Myles Bullock, and Lance Reddick.

White Men Can’t Jump is a modern retelling of the iconic 1992 film that celebrates the streetball hustling culture of Los Angeles. Sinqua Walls stars as Kamal, once a promising player who derailed his future in the sport, and multi-platinum rap superstar Jack Harlow makes his movie debut as Jeremy, a former star of the game whose injuries stalled his own career. Juggling tenuous relationships, financial pressures, and serious internal struggles, the two ballers—opposites who are seemingly miles apart—find they might have more in common than they imagined possible.

The film is written by Kenya Barris and Doug Hall. White Men Can’t Jump is produced by Kenya Barris and Paul Hall, and it is executive produced by Blake Griffin, Ryan Kalil, Noah Weinstein, Calmatic, Doug Hall, E. Brian Dobbins, and James Powers.

White Men Can't Jump, directed by Calmatic, begins streaming on May 19, 2023, exclusively on Hulu in the U.S., Star+ in Latin America, and Disney+ under the Star banner in all other territories.

#IGN #Movies

title: The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom - How to Defeat Gloom Hands
description: Gloom Spawn (Or Gloom Hands) are one of the most terrifying enemies throughout all of The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom. Not only are they super creepy, but they're also quite difficult to bring down, and just when you think the fight is over, you have to deal with Phantom Ganon. It is possible though, and the reward is great for those with plenty of hearts to spare. Here's how to kill the Gloom Spawn, or Gloom Hands, in The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom.

title: Elemental - Official TV Spot (2023) Leah Lewis, Mamoudou Athie
description:
Take another look at Disney and Pixar's Elemental in this new teaser. The upcoming movie features the voices of Leah Lewis and Mamoudou Athie as Ember and Wade, respectively.

Elemental is set in Element City, where Fire-, Water-, Earth- and Air-residents live together. The story introduces Ember, a tough, quick-witted and fiery young woman, whose friendship with a fun, sappy, go-with-the-flow guy named Wade challenges her beliefs about the world they live in. 

Directed by Peter Sohn, produced by Denise Ream, p.g.a., and executive produced by Pete Docter, Elemental features a screenplay by John Hoberg & Kat Likkel and Brenda Hsueh with story by Sohn, Hoberg & Likkel and Hsueh. The film’s original score was composed and conducted by Thomas Newman.

Elemental opens only in theaters on June 16, 2023.

#IGN #Pixar

title: Street Fighter 6 - Official Open Beta Battle Hub Overview
description:
Take a deep dive into the latest open beta video showcasing Street Fighter 6's community feature, the Battle Hub, including character avatar customization, battle cabinets, and the hub goods shop for apparel and items. In the Battle hub, you can play matches against other players, style your customized avatar, and engage in new ways in this interactive hub built for the community.

Street Fighter 6's Open Beta will be available from May 19-21 on PS5, PS4, Xbox Series X|S, and Steam.

#IGN #Gaming #StreetFighter

title: The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom - How To Get The Champion's Leathers
description:
Want to find the Zelda Breath of the Wild outfit in Tears of the Kingdom? The iconic TotK Champion's Tunic from BotW has made its return in the new Zelda game, and you can equip this Zelda armor for yourself! Whether you're feeling a bit nostalgic, or you're just looking for some new threads, here's what you have to do to find the Tears of the Kingdom BotW armor location.

#IGN #Gaming #Zelda

title: Diablo 4: The Story of Sanctuary So Far
description:
Diablo IV is nearly here and once again, the world of Sanctuary is at risk of being overrun by the forces of evil! How did the self-proclaimed Mother of Humanity come to play such a pivotal role in the newest installment? We’re catching you up on the lore that brought us to the current crisis.
From the pantheon of heavens and hell -- the story of Sanctuary is rife with conflict. From Lilith, Inarius, Rathma, worldstones, nephalem, and more -- we're detailing all the major events that take place BEFORE the events of Diablo IV to set the stage.

Diablo IV releases on PC, Xbox Series consoles, PlayStation 5, and PlayStation 4 on June 6th.
Presented by Diablo IV. 

#IGN

title: Dave the Diver - Official Release Month and Accolades Trailer
description:
Dave the Diver, the unique pixel-art "casual, single-player adventure RPG featuring deep-sea exploration and fishing during the day and sushi restaurant management at night," has proven very popular in Early Access. It's readying up its 1.0 release for Steam in June. Check out the new trailer to commemorate the upcoming milestone. Wishlist it or learn more on Steam:  https://store.steampowered.com/app/1868140/DAVE_THE_DIVER/

#IGN #Gaming

title: VR Skater Lets You Skate Like a Pro on PSVR2 Without the Pain of Falling
description: We were very impressed with the commitment to authenticity on display in VR Skater for PSVR 2, the upcoming skateboarding game for Sony's new PlayStation accessory. Previewed on PSVR 2 by Nick Maillet.

title: Haunted Mansion - Official Trailer (2023) LaKeith Stanfield, Danny DeVito
description:
Check out the new Haunted Mansion trailer for the upcoming movie starring LaKeith Stanfield, Tiffany Haddish, Owen Wilson, Danny DeVito, Rosario Dawson, Chase W. Dillon, and Dan Levy, with Jamie Lee Curtis and Jared Leto as The Hatbox Ghost.

Inspired by the classic theme park attraction, “Haunted Mansion” is about a woman and her son who enlist a motley crew of so-called spiritual experts to help rid their home of supernatural squatters. The film’s producers are Dan Lin and Jonathan Eirich, with Nick Reynolds and Tom Peitzman serving as executive producers.

Haunted Mansion, directed by Justin Simien, opens in US theaters on July 28, 2023, and in UK cinemas on August 11, 2023.

#IGN #Movies #Disney

title: Station to Station - Official Announcement Trailer
description:
You've got to check out the first trailer for Station to Station, the beautiful new "minimalist, chill, voxel-art railroad building simulator," as the developers at Galaxy Grove and publisher Prismatika describe it. It's coming to PC (via, appropriately enough, Steam) later this year. Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested:  https://store.steampowered.com/app/2272400/Station_to_Station/

#IGN #Gaming

title: The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom - How to Find the Korok Mask
description:
Wondering how to find the Tears of the Kingdom Korok Mask? The TotK Korok Mask is a valuable tool in hunting those pesky Tears of the Kingdom Korok Seed Locations as it handily reacts when one is nearby! The area to get the TotK Korok Mask could be considered a spoiler and is a challenge, but if you’re determined you can get it rather early. It's an important piece of Zelda Tears of the Kingdom gear, and definitely a Totk mask you won't want to miss.

Do you want to find the Tears of the Kingdom Korok Mask location? Here's how you do it.

#IGN #Gaming #Zelda

title: Zelda Actress Reacts to IGN Comments
description:
Watch Tears of the Kingdom Zelda react to IGN comments! We showed Breath of the Wild and TotK's Princess Zelda voice actress, Patricia Summersett, some of our favourite comments that you posted about The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom... Here's her reaction to your Zelda comments!

#IGN #Gaming #Zelda
